channel.title: SoftLayer_Network on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Network on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network
item.description: SoftLayer_Network Service Datatype Description Local accountId The owning account identifier. Type: integer id Unique identifier for the network. Type: integer Relational cidr The size of the Network specified in CIDR notation. Specified in conjunction with the ``networkIdentifier`` to describe the bounding subnet size for the Network. Required for creation. See [[SoftLayer_Network/createObject]] documentation for creation details. Type: integer
